title: Stole from a store when kid, will returning its value without telling owner suffice? assim al hakeem
transcript: sh I remembered that I had stolen a candy from a grocery store more than a decade ago when I was like six or seven years old and the owner to this day doesn't know about it and the store and the owner is still present till today if I give the money back to the cash register saying that we'll get an x amount from me as it's common for me to have deals with them uh and they gladly receives it without knowing that I'm returning the Lost item in cash equal to the item that I stolen also making sure the owner doesn't know about this to conceal my sin with this suffice it while also repenting to Allah yes the answer is that would suffice if you return the value of the stolen item to the lawful law owner without telling them this is sufficient inshallah
